bibl.title: ""Jesus says: 'There Is Nothing Buried That Will Not Be Raised'."" A Late-Antique Shroud with Gospel of Thomas Logion 5 in Context.
bibl.note: Earlier versions of the contribution were presented at the Center for the Study of Early Christianity at the Catholic University of America, Washington DC, and the 26e Congrès International de Papyrologie, Université de Genève, Geneva, Switzerland. - [Introduction:] The Shroud. - Part 1: Textual Provenance: The Gospel of Thomas in Greek; - Quoting the Gospel of Thomas; - Ressurecting the Body. - Part 2: Funerary Context: Illegal Excavations at Oxyrhynchus; - Linen and Things; - Books and the Dead; - The Tenacity of the Gospel of Thomas. - Avec résumé en allemand.
